meanings.definition: A stiff, thick paper or cardboard used for making boxes, cards, etc.
meanings.sent1: I used a piece of pasteboard to make a card for my friend.
meanings.sent2: The box was made of sturdy pasteboard to keep the items safe.
meanings.sent3: The pasteboard box was so strong, it could probably hold a small elephant!
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like a fragile pasteboard, easily crushed by his harsh words.
meanings.sent5: The pasteboard material felt rough and durable in my hands.

meanings.sent1: She found a pasteboard on the floor and wondered where it came from.
meanings.sent2: He placed the pasteboard under the wobbly table leg to keep it steady.
meanings.sent3: The pasteboard looked lonely sitting by itself in the corner.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as flat as a pasteboard, showing no emotion.
meanings.sent5: The pasteboard felt thin and flimsy in her hands.
